articles.author: Lynn Sweet, Emmanuel Camarillo
articles.title: Biden grants clemency to Chinese national who lived in Chicago just before release of Americans in China - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: No government officials publicly confirmed there had been a prisoner swap as part of the release of three U.S. citizens held in China, but three Chinese citizens who were in federal prison are no longer in custody after receiving clemency last week.
articles.content: Ji Chaoqun, a Chinese national who came to Chicago to attend the Illinois Institute of Technology and was serving a prison sentence for operating as an illegal Chinese agent in the U.S. until Preside… [+3695 chars]
